title: Creator Mode
desc: Same SP and CP gains from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Easy difficulty, but you also get essentially unlimited extra SP.... Pussy.

title: God Mode
desc: You gain as much SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Easy difficulty, but you also get a lot of extra SP.

title: Very Easy
desc: You gain as much SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Easy difficulty, but you also get a bit of extra SP.

title: Easy
desc: You gain more SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks.

title: Standard
desc: You gain the standard amount of SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks.

title: Hard
desc: You gain less SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks.

title: Very Hard
desc: You gain as much SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Hard difficulty, but you also get an SP penalty.

title: Skitter Mode
desc: You gain as much SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Hard difficulty, but you must pay an even higher SP penalty.

title: Masochist Mode
desc: You gain as much SP and CP from Scenarios and Drawbacks as on Hard difficulty, but you also pay an extremely high SP penalty. Why do this to yourself?
